data.title: Study On Customer Persecption About Online Shopping
data.meta_description: STUDY ON CUSTOMER PERSECPTION ABOUT ONLINE SHOPPING.docx - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a project report submitted by Nikita Prasad to the University of Mumbai on a study of consumer expectations and perceptions of online shopping. The report was conducted under the guidance of Prof. Sadaf Khan and analyzes a survey of over 3,100 US online shoppers regarding their past shopping experiences, what makes them return to or recommend websites, and preferences for checkout, shipping, tracking, returns and post-purchase services. The objective is to provide insights to retailers on satisfying customers and increasing loyalty. The problem statement discusses the importance for online organizations to understand consumer wants and needs in the competitive e-commerce environment.
